intension: Design a seasonal menu advertisement for a restaurant with a focus on healthy, vegan and vegetarian options. Highlight the seasonal ingredients such as asparagus and egg. Encourage the audience to swipe up for more information.
globalcaption: The image features a dining table with a white plate on it, containing a delicious meal. The plate is topped with a variety of food items, including a sandwich, a salad, and a fried egg. The salad is garnished with asparagus, adding a touch of color and freshness to the dish. \n\nIn addition to the main plate, there are a few other items on the table, such as a bowl and a cup. A fork and a knife are also placed on the table, ready for use. The overall scene suggests a well-prepared and appetizing meal.
keywords: dish, food, greens, healthy, nutrition, ration, recipe, sauce, vegetables, vitamins, egg, asparagus, menu, restaurant, ad, instagram, ig, insta, advertisement

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a dining table with a white plate on it, containing a delicious meal. The plate is topped with a fried egg, asparagus, and a salad. There are two forks placed on the table, one on the left side and the other on the right side, ready for use. A knife is also present on the right side of the table. The table setting creates an inviting atmosphere for a delightful meal
